targets.expr: topk(5, sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (namespace, kubernetes_cluster)) by (kubernetes_cluster)
topk(5, sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (namespace, kubernetes_cluster)) by (kubernetes_cluster)
topk(5, sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (namespace, kubernetes_cluster)) by (kubernetes_cluster)
topk(5, sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (namespace, kubernetes_cluster)) by (kubernetes_cluster)
topk(5, sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (namespace, kubernetes_cluster)) by (kubernetes_cluster)
topk(5, sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", node!~".*(master|build).*", kubernetes_cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (namespace, kubernetes_cluster)) by (kubernetes_cluster)

list.name: cluster
list.query: .+(v3|v2|fp|hz).*, .+v2.*, .+(v3|fp|hz).*, gb1-li-beunityv2, gb1-li-feunityv2, gb4-li-beunityv2, gb4-li-feunityv2, gb1-li-feunityv3, gb1-li-beunityv3, gb4-li-feunityv3, gb4-li-beunityv3, gb1-li-feunityhz, gb1-li-feunityfp, gb4-li-feunityhz, gb4-li-feunityfp
